meanings.definition: A person who believes that a particular race is superior to another.
meanings.sent1: Some racists think one race is better than all others.
meanings.sent2: We should stand up against racists who spread hate.
meanings.sent3: The racists at the party argued about which race was the best.
meanings.sent4: The idea of racists being superior is like a broken compass, always pointing the wrong way.
meanings.sent5: The image of racists looking down on others is truly disturbing.

meanings.definition: A person who discriminates against others based on their race.
meanings.sent1: Racists treat people unfairly because of their race.
meanings.sent2: It is important to educate others about the harm caused by racists.
meanings.sent3: The racists in the movie were portrayed as foolish and ignorant.
meanings.sent4: The shadow of racists looms over society, casting a dark cloud of division.
meanings.sent5: The impact of racists can be felt in the pain they cause to innocent people.
